instrument_status.comment: green laser error needs checking out at end of current run
laser warning clicked through and run resumed. JS suggests planned maintenance check at end of current run
green laser power has shut down.(production flowcell on board)
PC GPU failure, replaced with new. Ready to run
Can not get monitor to work. Have tried another monitor and changed all cables. No joy. Please be aware there is a production FC on board requiring R2 prep.
X/Y Stage removed and refitted. All co-ordinates retaught. Stage flatness and tile tilt adjusted.
Laser warmup time incorrect and adjusted.
Book for laser check. (Very low intensities, lower after rehye, flowcell loaded fine on another machine)
Stage not moving smoothly, causing tilt position variation. Stage replced.
Flowcell focus position tilt giving high results in FBR, please check.
Dirt noticed on rear Manifold also coolant is low
Excess flowcell tilt and tile tilt found on instrument. Corrected and run full suite of component tests. Replaced mode scrambler with new due to varying intensity from cycle to cycle.

Please could you check this instrument as latest run shows similar problems to previous runs (4594 and 4464 both of which failed) affecting all lanes in patches of straight lines. Previous bookings for this were on 23/3 and 29/4. Latest run has not completed analysis yet but the charts show the same problem. Now on a Noah wash.
Test flowcell to be loaded to check error rates
analysis looks poor. Have asked T Ost to have a look. would like fluidics checked out in meantime please
On hold waiting for analysis data
On hold waiting for analysis data
3 way valve clogged up, replaced with new and upgraded priming pump to 250ul (PEMIIx)
PEM not priming 7ml for Read2, less than 1ml being primed

Underdelivery of reagents from PEM to flowcell found. VICI valve was leaking badly, amd tubing from PEM to VICI valve was slightly damaged. Replaced VICI valve and tubing with new. Ran full fluidics test on all reagent positions. All ok, please wash before use.
Please could you give this instrument a quick check over before we re-load as last two runs both have high error rates and poor R2 alignment. 2nd run was a cBot test. Instrument now idle.
Front manifold replaced, NaOH wash required.
Front manifold replaced with new (part arrived this afternoon) Fluidics checked all ok.
Fracture in front manifold, part will need to be replaced and fluidics tested. Part is currently on order.
Thermal station temp calibrated and reset position.
Please could you check the peltier is functioning correctly across the FC. Now on C110/216.
Lanes 7 & 8 no more sample left, end user would like all data
ASI controller cards and cables reseated. Autofocus laser replaced with new. Two 36cycle mock runs complete without issue.
X,Y Stage error. Current run will need to be removed to troubleshoot problem. Likely stage replacement required.
PE Module is too warm & does not seem to be drawing up air. It is not a PEM2x. Off at the moment.
Autofocus laser replaced with new and calibrated.
focus mean spot 0.58 instead of expected 0.9 and random out of focus first base pictures
Laser engine upgrade complete. Ready to run
Low intensities after primer-rehyb and Lin/block primer hyb. Flowcell moved to IL13 and doubled intensities.
Corrosion on front manifold, reducing flow to lane 8. Changed front manifold and checked volumes, all passed.
Lane8 data lost. R2 prep failure. Syringe drawing air.
Please could you check the instrument as we lost Lane 8 at C12 of the last run. Syringe 8 was drawing only air on R2 prep. Now on C109/216.
Reagent chiller replaced with new, temps checked all ok.
PE Module too warm. Now on R2 C35/76.
The Wizard wanted to look at this instrument due to it's operation time out error during imaging on the last run.
GA2x upgrade complete. NaOH was required prior to next run.
GA2x upgrade completed. NaOH required before first run.
Laser engine replaced with new, laser power level checked all ok.
New laser engine installed and tested. ready to wash and run (RH)
Passes validation criteria. Awaiting signoff acceptance.
Annotated Status History by mistake (instead of run) - instrument put down by mistake. No instrumentation problems with IL18.
Failed to restart before C8.1 imaging. Deleted starting and restarting files from/config , restarted pc, refocussed and recalibrated AF prior to resumption of imaging at C8.1.
Changed z axis motor. Checked and adjusted stage flatness.
Manual focus issue. "Possible" Z stage problem
Autofocus laser adjusted, calibration run, all variables within specification.
